component.name: createComponent
component.description: Creates a new component related to a project

component.name: deleteComponent
component.description: Deletes a component related to a project

component.name: getComponent
component.description: Get a component related to a project given component id

component.name: updateComponent
component.description: Update a component related to a project given component id

component.name: getComponentRelatedIssueCount
component.description: Returns counts of issues related to this component.
